availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Ireland. Father of John Conway, Dennis Conway, Bridget Conway, Bettie Conway, and Mary Conway. Farmer in Nicholas County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Precinct 4, p. 245A.
_ Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Nicholas County Administration Bonds, 1854-1969; (Accessed through ancestry.com on April 29, 2020), p. 1338 of microfilm.
_Find A Grave, "Owen Conway (1825-1906)," Memorial #116750764, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/116750764 (accessed April 29, 2020).
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's
Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Nicholas County, KY, July 1863, p. 183 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
